intro.heading: Introduction
intro.content:
For years I played music and was mesmerized by the rich harmony in our worship sets. Something sounded perfect, yet I couldn't name it—until I picked up the bass because the band had none. That almost-silent line carries the whole song.

Digital strategy works the same way. People see elite brands rise above the rest without knowing why; the secret is the talent and technology humming underneath.

I'm Ignacio Gómez, founder of Bit-A. We fine-tune that hidden layer so your online presence pulses with depth while you take the solo your brand deserves.

story.heading: We believe there's a better way to craft digital experiences
story.content: Bit-A was born after watching high-caliber brands pour fortunes into showrooms, dealerships, and luxury offices while their online presence stagnated in outdated sites and legacy systems propped up by the old "if it ain't broke, don't fix it." Our mission is to overturn that mindset: we bring the same excellence, security, and innovation you showcase offline to the digital realm, unleashing your brand's full potential.

cta.heading: Let's Elevate Your Brand
cta.content: You've seen what drives us — now it's time to bring that same clarity and craftsmanship to your project. Whether you're ready to start or just exploring possibilities, let's talk.

about.title: About Bit-A
about.description: At Bit-A, we specialize in creating digital experiences that sell lifestyles, not just properties. We're a boutique studio of engineers and designers obsessed with performance, elegance, and results. We understand that in real estate, first impressions matter—and your website is often your first showing. That's why we build fast, beautiful, and strategic websites tailored to high-end real estate professionals who want to stand out, build trust, and close with confidence. If you're serious about positioning your brand at the top of the market, we're the team behind the digital presence that gets you there.

pricing.title: Are you ready?
pricing.description: Start building your premium real estate website today. We work with a transparent and flexible payment model designed to give you clarity and control:
items: 50% upfront payment to kick off your project.
Pay-as-you-go based on deliverables—only pay as milestones are completed.
You receive the full cost breakdown before we start, including monthly services (like hosting) and annual ones (like domain renewal).
If your desired domain is available, you may even get the first year free—right from the start.
We'll guide you through every step, and you'll always know exactly what you're paying for.

items.question: How long does the project take?
items.answer: Most real estate websites are ready within 3 to 5 weeks, depending on the complexity and responsiveness during the feedback rounds.

items.question: Can I update my website after it's launched?
items.answer: Yes! We deliver your site with training and support, so you can manage listings, content, or changes on your own—or request our help anytime.

items.question: What's the total investment?
items.answer: The full cost depends on your specific needs, but we always provide a clear, fixed quote upfront. You'll also receive a breakdown of monthly (hosting) and annual (domain) costs.

items.question: Do you offer domain and hosting services?
items.answer: Yes. We manage everything for you. If your desired domain is available, you may get the first year free.

items.question: What happens if I need more features later?
items.answer: Your site is built to grow. We can easily add new pages, tools, or integrations as your business expands.

items.question: Do you offer any kind of warranty or guarantee?
items.answer: Yes. Every website we build comes with a 2-year warranty that covers technical issues, performance bugs, and small updates related to the original scope. We're here to make sure your site continues to perform at the highest level—long after launch.

finalCta.title: Your next client is just one click away
finalCta.description: Stop losing opportunities with a site that doesn't represent who you are. Let's build a digital presence that matches the level of the properties you sell—and the reputation you want to own.

intro.title: Your privacy is important to us
intro.content: It is Bit-A's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website. This Privacy Policy applies to bit-a.com (hereinafter, "us", "we", or "bit-a.com"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting personally identifiable information you may provide us through the Website. We have adopted this privacy policy to explain what information may be collected on our Website, how we use this information, and under what circumstances we may disclose the information to third parties.

visitors.title: Website visitors
visitors.content: Like most website operators, Bit-A collects non-personally-identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. Bit-A's purpose in collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how Bit-A's visitors use its website.

pii.title: Personally-identifying information
pii.content: Certain visitors to Bit-A's websites choose to interact with Bit-A in ways that require Bit-A to gather personally-identifying information. The amount and type of information that Bit-A gathers depends on the nature of the interaction.

security.title: Security
security.content: The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: To enrich and perfect your online experience, Bit-A uses "Cookies", similar technologies and services provided by others to display personalized content, appropriate advertising and store your preferences on your computer.

changes.title: Privacy policy changes
changes.content: Although most changes are likely to be minor, Bit-A may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and in Bit-A's sole discretion. Bit-A encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy.
